name: Nuuskaralli: Neo-Tornio
description:
CUSTOMS FOUND OUT ABOUT  YOUR SNUS

Only one thing to do:

Drive for as long and for as far as you can on the super highways of Neo-Tornio. Get more snus, mod your car, and try not to die!

- Try to drive as far as possible on constantly evolving track

- Evolve your vehicle with mighty power-ups

- Be the best snus-smuggler that the world has ever seen
